verses.name: Acts 27:23
verses.text: For there stood by me this night the angel of God, whose I am, and whom I serve,

verses.name: Acts 27:24
verses.text: Saying, Fear not, Paul; thou must be brought before Cesar: and, lo, God hath given thee all them that sail with thee.

verses.name: Acts 27:25
verses.text: Wherefore, sirs, be of good cheer: for I believe God, that it shall be even as it was told me.

verses.name: Acts 27:26
verses.text: Howbeit we must be cast upon a certain island.

verses.name: Acts 27:27
verses.text: But when the fourteenth night was come, as we were driven up and down in Adria, about midnight the shipmen deemed that they drew near to some country;
